name: Slime Race
description:
WASD to move

Left Click to Shoot

Right Click to roll

Roll and Shoot your way past the waves of angler slimes to recover the green slime crown and save your kingdom from despair!  The water slimes slowly multiply and grow strong together, your only hope is to collect guns that improve upon each other or find the crown fast enough.  See who's stronger together, the angler slimes, or the guns...

If you want a harder challenge, see how long you can survive!

Unfortunately the crosshair doesn't show up, this was not intended.
